meta.title: All That I Need
meta.comment:
repeat
Chorus
Michael J. Pritzl
(c)1991 Mercy Publishing

lines.text: All that I am,     all that I'll ever be
Lord, make me more  like thee
Oh Lord, I love you, I love your ways
For you are strong when I am weak
I lay  my life down at your feet
For you are all that I need
Just as I am,  I come to you oh Lord
And this is all I am
